title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Introducing the revolutionary Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse, the ultimate solution for all your computer needs. Engineered to perfection, this exceptional mouse is designed to provide unparalleled precision and comfort, making it the ideal choice for those who demand the best.

Featuring a cutting-edge trackball with side-to-side scrolling capabilities, this trackball mouse offers unparalleled control and accuracy, ensuring seamless navigation through your documents, spreadsheets, and web pages. Say goodbye to traditional mice that strain your hand and hello to ergonomic bliss with the Logitech Trackman Marble.

Equipped with a maximum DPI of 300, this mouse guarantees swift and precise cursor movements, allowing you to effortlessly accomplish your tasks. Available in three sleek colors, red, gray, and white, this mouse not only delivers top-notch performance but also adds a touch of style to your workspace.

Measuring at a compact 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, this wired mouse is the perfect size for any desktop setup. With versatile PS/2 and USB connectivity, it ensures compatibility with a wide range of computers, providing you with a hassle-free experience.

Designed with both left and right-handed users in mind, the Logitech Trackman Marble features two buttons that can be easily customized to suit your preferences. Whether you're a lefty or righty, this mouse guarantees ergonomic comfort and effortless control, enhancing your productivity like never before.

Crafted with precision and reliability in mind, this exceptional mouse hails from the technology hub of China. With Logitech's renowned expertise and cutting-edge manufacturing techniques, you can trust that this mouse will exceed your expectations and deliver unparalleled performance, day in and day out.
